column4: Hi I'm in a little emergency. I've installed something called 8.04 LTS. I fear that may mean light server? Is that correct?
the problem is that when I start the system, it appears a sort of command line OS, rather than the nice UI I had before. Is there a way I can install the desktop package from the command line?
in /etc/init.d or just from my home directory?
it's downloading a lot of stuff. I believe I didn't have any desktop package on my PC right?
yeah if it needs to install alot of packages it sounds like there was no desktop environment installed
